history.action: üî¨ EMBEDDING & VECTOR STORAGE EVALUATION (docs/research/embedding-vector-storage-evaluation.md, Issue #17 comment) ‚Äî Comprehensive technical evaluation supporting PLAT-002 Phase 3. Compared 5 embedding models, 5 vector stores. Recommends all-MiniLM-L6-v2 + JSON/SQLite-vec stack. Zero-dep Phase 1, scale path to 100K+ entries. Architecture: EmbeddingProvider + VectorStore interfaces. Cost: $0/month local.

üåå PHASE 3.2 LIFECYCLE MANAGER (PR #61, Issue #17) ‚Äî Implemented persistent vector store (JsonVectorStore) and MemoryLifecycleManager. Zero-dep JSON storage per Research recommendation. Three-tier system operational: hot (bank.md), warm (vector store), cold (archives). Features: tier transitions, unified search, access tracking. 39 new tests (22 vector store, 17 lifecycle). All 299 core tests passing. PR #61 opened.
